input.sentences: we crossed this bridge on our way to the park .
as we made our way through the park | we heard the birds singing .
the we stopped to shop at some stores .
at the end of the day we were tired | so we stopped to rest on a pretty bench .
after we rested we went to see another beautiful park
output.sentences: I was taking a walk in the park, and I decided to walk across a bridge I had not seen before.
Then I heard some singing and decided to try to find out where it was coming from.
I couldn't find the source of the singing, but I did stumble upon a row of shops that I hadn't seen before.
I decided that I was a little too tired for some shopping, and so I sat down on a nearby bench to take a break.
I looked back at the park and realized just how beautiful it really was.
